description:
This is a command line interface for LibreSpeed speed test backends, written in Go.

Features
- Ping
- Jitter
- Download
- Upload
- IP address
- ISP Information
- Result sharing (telemetry) [optional]
- Test with multiple servers in a single run
- Use your own server list or telemetry endpoints
- Tested with PHP and Go backends

NOTE: Some antivirus software may flag this program as a malware. It is a false positive. 
This is a known issue https://github.com/librespeed/speedtest-cli/issues/29
author: LibreSpeed
